text: Miriam Lopez-Escribano is a Spanish water polo player. She played for the Spain women's national water polo team. She participated at the 2007 World Aquatics Championships, 2008 Women's European Water Polo Championship,http://www.omegatiming.com/File/Download?id=0001080A000005FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF08 2009 World Aquatics Championships. ==References== ==External links== * ¡Campeones! title: Miriam Lopez-Escribano
